question: Keyless doors must be included in the keying schedules.
Keying schematics should include door numbers.
Door numbers should be unique for each door on the drawing.
An architectural drawing always has a title block.
Which of these drawings shows the object as seen from above?
Which of these drawings shows the object as seen from the front?
Which term is used for making a large number of change keys operate a cylinder?
When do you use a three-level system instead of a two-level system?
option: when middle level keys are required for operation of the facility
when 3 levels is required by the ANSI standard
when the customer can afford a third level
when the expansion is unknown and a third level may be required later
when additional key control and resistance to bumping is required

question: In a three-level system, which of the follow keys would not operate the A2R13 lock?
option: All of them would operate A2R13.
